name: Diggy's Adventure: Secret Maze
description:
Start playing Diggy’s Adventure today - loved by millions of players around the world.

Help Diggy search for hidden chambers and reveal well hidden mysteries of our past. Come on in - adventures await you from the moment you walk in our beautiful puzzle world!

Dig through the hardest mysteries in this divine puzzle adventure to progress to the next level in hope of achieving that sweet feeling! Quick thinking and smart moves are rewarded with precious artefacts, special chests and tasty refreshment combos!

Plan your moves by crushing the tiles and solving the puzzles in order to overcome those extra sticky levels! Unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!

Diggy’s Adventure features:
● Unique gameplay: help Diggy finish quests from gods and become the greatest adventurer!
● Camp design: you decide and manage how your camp will look like
● Exciting puzzle levels: tons of fun, featuring unique riddles and brain teaser combinations!
● Check back daily to receive free tasty rewards, take part in time limited challenges to earn boosters to help you level up!
● A huge, beautiful locations: explore the whole world and discover all the secrets it holds!
● Fantastic characters: reveal the secret environments and meet the funny characters
● Special levels: play hundreds of levels with more added in regular updates and limited time events.
● Journey that never ends: there's no riddle that can't be solved!
● It's easy to sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet

Diggy’s Adventure is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, you’ll have a blast!

Visit https://care.pxfd.co/diggysadventure if you need help from our caring community managers!
